tasks.label: docker run redis
tasks.command: (docker rm -f redis || true) && docker run -p 127.0.0.1:6379:6379 --name redis -d redis:4-alpine

tasks.label: docker run kafka
tasks.command: (docker rm -f kafka || true) && docker run -p 2181:2181 -p 9092:9092 --env ADVERTISED_HOST=`docker-machine ip \`docker-machine active\`` --env ADVERTISED_PORT=9092 -d spotify/kafka
